mapper.select: SELECT /* eduCounsel.getCslCure */ CC.MBR_NO , CC.CSL_NO , CC.CSL_ID , SU.USR_NM AS CSL_NM , CC.CSL_DT , CC.CSL_FM_TM , CC.CSL_TO_TM , CC.CSL_TERM_TM , CC.CSL_TGT_CD , CC.CSL_TP_CD , CC.RSKA_TP_CD , CC.RSKB_TP_CD , CC.RSKC_TP_CD , CC.RSK_SCO , CC.CSL_SBJ , CC.CRISIS_COUNSEL , CC.URS_CD , CC.CSL_TGT , CC.DRUG_USE_CD , CC.OLD_ACT_CD , CC.ACT_CD , CC.AROUND_SUICIDE_CD , CC.SUICIDE_PLAN_CD , CC.OLD_ACT_WAY_CD , CC.ACT_WAY_CD , CC.CURE_CD , CC.CSL_CTNT , CC.CSL_RST , CC.NXT_CSL_DT , CC.NXT_CSL_TM , CC.NXT_CSL_CTNT , CC.FILE_ID , CC.CRE_ID , CC.CRE_DT , CC.UPD_ID , CC.UPD_DT , CC.CSL_MNG_USR_ID , CC.CSL_MNG_NM , CC.CSL_CLS_CD , MB.MBR_NM , MB.AGE , MB.ADDR1 ,MB.ADDR2 , CONCAT(MB.TEL_NO1,'-',MB.TEL_NO2,'-',MB.TEL_NO3) AS TEL_NO , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = MB.GEND_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C1100') AS GEND , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = MB.JOB_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C1200') AS JOB , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.CSL_TGT_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C2500') AS CSL_TGT /* 상담대상 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.CSL_CLS_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C8800') AS CSL_CLS /* 상담구분 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.CSL_TP_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C1600') AS CSL_TP /* 상담유형 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.RSKA_TP_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C2100') AS RSKA /* rating A */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.RSKB_TP_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C2200') AS RSKB /* rating B */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.RSKC_TP_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C2300') AS RSKC /* rating C */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.URS_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5600') AS USR /* USR */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.CURE_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5700') AS CURE /* 치료력 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.DRUG_USE_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5800') AS DRUG_USE /* 약물사용여부 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.AROUND_SUICIDE_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5800') AS AROUND_SUICID /* 주변인자살 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.SUICIDE_PLAN_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5800') AS SUICIDE_PLAN /* 자살계획 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.OLD_ACT_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5900') AS OLD_ACT /* 과거 자살시도력 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.ACT_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C5900') AS ACT /* 시도횟수 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.OLD_ACT_WAY_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C6000') AS OLE_ACT_WAY /* 과거 시도방법 */ , (SELECT CD_NM FROM SYS_CD WHERE CD_ID = CC.ACT_WAY_CD AND GRP_CD = 'C6000') AS ACT_WAY /* 시도계획방법 */ , FI.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM ED_CONSULT CC LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (CC.CSL_ID = SU.USR_ID) LEFT JOIN ED_MBR MB ON CC.MBR_NO = MB.MBR_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON (FI.FILE_ID = CC.FILE_ID) WHERE CC.CSL_NO = #{cslNo}

SELECT /* eduCounsel.getCslCureSeq */ CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(CSL_NO, 12) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 4, '0')) AS rcpSeq FROM ED_CONSULT WHERE CSL_NO LIKE CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE /* eduCounsel.deleteCslCure */ FROM ED_CONSULT WHERE CSL_NO = #{cslNo}
